lessons.title: Parts of Speech — Nouns and Verbs

content.text: This lesson introduces nouns and verbs using simple examples.

items: A noun names a person, place, thing, or idea.
A verb shows an action or a state of being.

quiz.prompt: Which word is the verb in: 'Birds fly south.'?

content.text: A sentence has two main parts: a subject and a predicate.

items: The subject tells who or what the sentence is about.
The predicate tells what the subject does or is.

quiz.prompt: What is the subject in: 'The students study.'?
